results.description: The historic Millennium Biltmore Hotel has been a legendary Los Angeles landmark since 1923. results.name: H By H Hospitality
results.description: If you're looking for a firsthand experience into the glamorous, unmistakably magnetic heart of Los Angeles, look no further . Welcome to H by H Hospitality, a not-so-humble abode that feels like your whimsical home away from home. Whether the escape you're looking for is an unforgettable or a regrettable one, we've got you covered. Leave your worries at the door, and let us show you just what it means to live among the City of Angels. From the moment you arrive, let your soul indulge in our unparalleled aesthetics. Find yourself lost amongst the walls and halls of our distinctive mid-century modern decor. Let the line between reality and fantasy slip away into the sunset, one expertly crafted cocktail at a time. Should you find yourself tempted by the unmistakable smells of LA's most sought after brunch spot, simply head downstairs and satisfy your palate with the exceptional creations of our award-winning Chef. When night falls and you find yourself looking for a morally questionable midnight excursion, look no further: we've lived in Los Angeles our entire lives, and we know just what your heart desires. From dusk to dawn to those forbidden hours in between, H by H Hospitality is your all-encompassing guide to all of LA's darkest, riskiest and most enchanting adventures.Whether you're looking to meet your wife or escape her for the night, H has the answer your soul craves.

results.description: After a highly anticipated $2.5 billion redevelopment of famed architect Minoru Yamasaki's mid-century modern landmark hotel, Fairmont Century Plaza is completely reimagined to include 351 spacious guest rooms and 49 suites, all with private terraces, bringing you the best the city has to offer. Revel in the 14,000 square-foot breathtaking Fairmont Spa featuring nine treatment rooms, Himalayan salt room, aromatherapy steam room, experiential rainfall shower and more; state-of-the-art fitness center equipped with Technogym; or at our rooftop pool with unparalleled 360 degrees of the cityscape from canyon to shoreline. Dine at Lumiere, our sublime French-inspired brasserie or enjoy live music and a cocktail at The Bar and a cozy meal from in-room dining. Located in the heart of Los Angeles, we are adjacent to Beverly Hills and within a short drive to the beaches of Santa Monica, nightlife of West Hollywood and many of the city's famed cultural institutions and entertainment destinations. If you are in search of diversions closer to your stay, we are steps away from Westfield Century City which offers some of Los Angeles' best retail from chic boutiques to anchor department stores, Eataly, AMC theatres and more. Since opening its door in 1966, the Century Plaza has been where business meets Hollywood. To this day, we celebrate our storied history which includes visits from every President from Ford through Obama and the Apollo 11 astronauts, and a who's who of beloved entertainers. Music is at the heart of our hotel - Sonny and Cher once had a residency here, The Beatles won a Grammy here, and much more. During your stay, be sure to ask one of our ambassadors for more interesting facts and anecdotes! From glamorous history to contemporary luxury, the Fairmont Century Plaza is truly at the center of it all.

results.description: Silver Lake Pool & Inn sits on a corner just south of the Sunset Junction in the heart of Silver Lake, one of the most exciting neighborhoods in all of Los Angeles. We are a short stroll from some of the best restaurants in the city and an active art and music scene with indie shops, galleries and cafes filled with locals who inspire and influence the neighborhood's one-of-a-kind culture. Our Inn features an elevated pool deck, 54 oversized guest rooms and suites as well as Marco Polo, a coastal Italian inspired outdoor restaurant and bar. Our rooms and suites offer everything you would ever need for a comfortable stay, all with a front-row seat to Silver Lake's dynamic energy. Accommodations have warm, lush and luxurious touches with every room getting a healthy dose of Southern California sunlight. High-speed Wi-Fi, fully stocked mini bars with locally sourced product, 55-inch TV's, laptop compatible safes and custom bath products lovingly included. Marco Polo Trattoria and Bar offers indoor and al fresco dining that expands into the hotel's lush Pool Deck. The seasonal menu from Chef Casey Lane combines the rich tradition of coastal Italian cuisine with bountiful California ingredients. Hotel guests and neighbors are invited to enjoy breakfast, lunch, dinner, brunch on the weekends, and daily Aperitivo Hour (4pm-6pm). We are excited to welcome you! Cashless property, A valid credit card, and ID are required at the time of check-in.
results.address: 4141 Santa Monica Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90029-3000
